description: This file exports a React functional component called NotePanel which provides a UI for viewing, editing, and deleting notes. It manages local state for editing a note and handles user interactions such as saving, canceling, and deleting notes.

methods.name: NotePanel({ note, onChange, onSave, onDelete, editing, onEditToggle, loading })
methods.description: React functional component for displaying and editing a note, with props for note data and callbacks for actions.
